text: Robert Bruce Zoellick (; ; born July 25, 1953) is an American lawyer and public official. He was the eleventh president of the World Bank from July 1, 2007 to June 30, 2012. He was a managing director of Goldman Sachs,Reuters (2006). Goldman says Zoellick to be vice chairman, intl. Retrieved June 20, 2006. United States Deputy Secretary of State and U.S. Trade Representative, from February 7, 2001 until February 22, 2005. Zoellick has been a senior fellow at Harvard's Belfer Center for Science and International Affairs since ending his term with the World Bank. He is currently a Senior Counselor at Brunswick Group. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:United States Trade Representatives Category:Presidents of the World Bank Group Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:Businesspeople from Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Naperville, Illinois
title: Robert Zoellick
